Active Noise Cancellation

Real-time filtering and embedded deployment for adaptive noise suppression.

Overview

I designed an adaptive filter pipeline, implemented it on embedded hardware, and measured attenuation performance in a controlled lab setup.

Highlights

  • Created a signal-processing chain with real-time FFT analysis.
  • Integrated sensors, actuators, and microcontroller firmware.
  • Documented experimental results with spectrogram comparisons.
